<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Emphatic Emissary](/Feats.aspx?ID=4120) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Twilight Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=203)

**Prerequisites**
[Disarming Smile](/Feats.aspx?ID=4116)

**Trigger**
You roll initiative.

</column>

---

You can tell when diplomacy has failed and a meeting is close to unraveling or falling to blows. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your initiative roll. During your first turn in combat, you can use your Disarming Smile, targeting every [hostile](/Conditions.aspx?ID=23) intelligent [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) creature that can see you but has yet to act. If you choose to sustain your Disarming Smile, you sustain the effect for only one creature, as normal.
name: Emphatic Emissary
